item.description:
People of Worcester County

 

The Worcester Alliance of Photographers is calling for entries to a juried exhibition along the theme of “People of Worcester County.” These images will hang in the City Hall Gallery.

 

 

 

Details you need to know.

 

This is a juried show. We only have 25 frames to fill in the gallery.

 

You will need to submit a digital image(s) via upload to a web site for jurying.

 

Deadline for submissions for the jury is Feb 8th, 2012 11PM

 

Please make your images 10 inches on the longest side at 150 DPI Jpegs and upload them here:  http://gallery.me.com/scotterb#104332

 

The File name should be your name_title_number of submission. Example: DonnaDufault_LakePark_1.jpeg

Please be sure I can find you on the Meetup Site to inform you of the selections. Several folks did not use their full names on the site and it was difficult for me to know how to contact you.

You are allowed to submit up to 3 images per person.

 

You will be notified on Feb 11th if your image or images have been chosen for the show. This will be posted on the Meetup Web site- here and on the message board, and if you accept emails from the site, I will do my best to send individual notices as well.

 

If you have been selected, you will be asked to print your image, mat it with a whitemat that will fit into a 16x24 frame, sign it, and come to the framing session on Feb 26th, 2012, so we can get these framed and ready to hang by the week of Feb 27th. (More details will be placed on the Meetup Web Site, Please check the calendar for that day.)

 

I asked that you mark your calendars now with these details and deadline so you can be up on all the happenings. I look forward to seeing this groups submissions for this show!

 

Cheers,

Donna and Scotty

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Online Submit Photos for the City Hall Gallery's Next Show Theme: People of Worc
